author: LMG Clips
description:
Thanks to our LMG clips sponsors dbrand, Dell, and Secretlab. You can check them out at the links below:

dbrand: https://dbrand.com/pcb
Dell: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips
Secretlab: https://lmg.gg/secretlablmgclips

Linus discusses how to reignite the passion for gaming. He covers using nostalgia with classic-inspired games, discovering new indie titles like Tape to Tape, Chained Echos, and CrossCode, and leveraging social connections by playing with friends or family to bring back the excitement and wonder of gaming.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i_cIhvzoKEM

► GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE: https://lmg.gg/lttfloatplane

title: Why Gaming Doesn't Feel the Same Anymore.

author: LMG Clips

Dell: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips
Secretlab: https://lmg.gg/secretlablmgclips

Linus and Luke dive into how Tencent is accessing Nvidia’s banned AI chips by renting GPUs overseas, sidestepping U.S. export controls. They discuss the implications of tech moving faster than legislation, the challenges of regulating AI, and whether such loopholes help or harm consumers.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i_cIhvzoKEM

title: China Found a Loophole for Banned GPUs
